name: Brian Bagwell
text: This rental is the best overall vacation home on Weiss Lake! 5 stars! We try to get this one every year that we go to Weiss Lake - It has a spacious, comfortable house with excellent views and a easy to find location.  You can fish from the swim dock or just go swimming. Great place to water ski from dock to the Coosa River flow in Weiss Lake.  Best Deal on the lake! Don't miss it!

name: Tonetta Gilbert
text: My family loves staying here (this past March was our fourth year staying at the house) We always have a great time. While my husband and kids fish, I relax out on the deck with a good book or knitting project. I recommend this house whether you are going to the lake to fish or just to get away from it all.

name: Rick Hauber
text: You can't get much better than this place!  We've stayed here for many years.  It's a beautiful setting with a beautiful view of the lake and the accommodations are awesome.  This house is fully furnished with all linens, bedding and a full laundry room for your convenience.   The kitchen has everything you need, the sleeping accommodations are very comfortable.  After a full day of fishing you can relax in the living room, light the fireplace for those cool evenings or sit around the table and talk.  The multilevel deck is big enough to relax and enjoy the view, sunbathe and there's room to tie up three boats.  There's also a fish cleaning station, with water, on the deck.  The deck is lighted for night fishing or relaxing.

name: Christopher Smith
text: This Was Our Third Trip And As Always A Great Experience. The Place Is Beautiful In The Spring. Prime Location For Fishing. The Dock Is Easily Accessible From The House and Located Just Off The Channel. I Can't Imagine A Better Location For Fishing. The House Is Nice Clean And Fully Furnished. They Have Everything You Need. Just Bring Food And Clothes. This Is Definitely A Trip I Plan On Making For Years To Come.

name: Jerry Pack
text:
A beautiful lake front home including docking facilities and a large outdoor deck. Plenty of parking and easy to access. Furnishings and appliances all updated. No need to take anything but yourself and enjoy.
My family has vacationed in this home for the last 11 years. We rent during the crappie season, which has always been productive. Docking facilities can accommodate up to 3 boats. Fish cleaning table and 110 volt AC available at the dock.
If you enjoy sight seeing, plenty of parks are nearby. If you enjoy shopping, there is and outlet mall not to far from the cabin in Boaz. Summer fun is at an optimum. Boating, skiing or tubing whatever your delight.
The Swifts  are delightful people always taking care of their customers.
So if you are looking for a fishing camp , summer retreat, or   Holiday gathering facility this home will definitely serve your purpose.
Thank you Michael and Lynn for sharing your awesome lake front home with us over the years.
Jerry Pack
Ohio

name: Mark Strange
text: We have been fishing Weiss Lake for 20 plus years, that says a lot about that lake. We have been staying at Michael's house for several of those years. I don't believe that you will find a nicer, more relaxing place to spend time whether you want to fish or just relax in the Alabama sun. The owners of the house will really make your stay enjoyable. So from the crew from southern Indiana come on down and have a great time on a great lake.

name: Jeffery Bates
text: Great place to stay

name: Alfred Flanagan II
text: Love this place

name: Tina Butts
text: I have been to 306 several times. Honestly I thought the seafood was much better than the BBQ. The catfish fillets and shrimp are both AWESOME!!! Recently tried the BBQ (bones) and I found it to be a bit dry. The BBQ chicken was good though.

name: Trenton Reynolds
text: This is definitely one of the best BBQ restaurants in the area! The loaded BBQ nachos were amazing. The ribs were so tender, and the brisket was very good also. The staff members were exceptional and provided fast and friendly service. We will be returning soon!

name: Maureen Feld
text: I have gone to 306 in Athens for a long time.  I moved to Athens Alabama from Tucson Arizona and didn't know what restaurants were good so I thought I'd try the local barbecue place called 306. I ordered the ribs, brown sugar green beans and Cole slaw and I was so surprised how good it all was!!! The people working there were wonderful and the owners were also wonderful!  They spent time with us and treated us so nicely. I asked how long they have been in business and they said 3 weeks!!!! Well, we told the world how great this place was! Then we moved to Gurley, Alabama and only visited 306 once in a while. I was so sad! Finally we bought a home in Decatur, Alabama and soon found out that they opened another location at the old Greenbriar restaurant that had closed. Hallelujah!!!! We are back in business for good eating again!!! This is by far the best place for ribs and brisket etc. Thank you 306 and staff!

name: Tami Thompson
text: Excellent food!  Excellent wait staff. Excellent prices!  Try it!  You won't be disappointed!!!

name: Brian Rodgers
text: Great service, good food. Marked improvement over previous barbeque joints at this location. The building acoustics have been much improved.

name: Harish Adhikesavan
text: Great food and good service. Loaded potato is a must try. The banana pudding was just amazing.

name: Tammy Schrimsher
text: A party of 35 wasn't expecting the outstanding service we received by the 306 servers, but what a pleasant experience we each were given by the top notch waitresses!!! Add the mouth watering ribs and Barbeque to the excellent service provided, and I guarantee the 306 Barbeque in Greenbrier will quickly become one of your favorite places to eat! We will definitely be going back!!

name: Zane Slocumb
text: Good service, good food. I recommend the catfish fillet with 2 sides!

name: David Cooper
text: Great BBQ !  Kewl bar and a very large restaurant with experienced wait staff.  Don't tell others or the secret will get out  ~

name: Zac Champion
text: Fast service, great pulled pork and banana pudding is fantastic!

name: Mikey P
text: Solid bbq with low prices!  The only downside is the location, which is sort of out in the middle of nowhere.  I guess that makes it easier to find.

name: Robert Jae
text: Great food, the original has a slight edge.

name: Cory Newman
text: Great place, love the new bar area.

name: Emma Hall
text: Their ribs and chicken tenders are me and my boyfriends favorite thing to get. We eat here religiously.

name: Philip H Ryan
text: Best BBQ sandwiches & Best service ever

name: Jermaine Hampton
text: Great food and service

name: Mike Giles
text: Friendly staff, food is good.

name: Steve Andrews
text: Great food

name: Will Rasely
text: Best barbecue in North Alabama!

name: Jermaine Hampton
text: Great food and service

name: Steve Andrews
text: Great food

name: Heather Arlinda
text:
(Translated by Google) Tssty

(Original)
Tssty
